article.title: POST /{db}/_bulk_docs
article.description: Add, update, or delete multiple documents to a database

introduction.paragraph: This request enables you to add, update, or delete multiple documents to a database in a single request.
To add new documents, you can either specify the ID (_id) or let the software create an ID.
To update existing documents, you must provide the document ID, revision identifier (_rev), and new document values.
To delete existing documents you must provide the document ID, revision identifier, and the deletion flag (_deleted).

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
The message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:

row.entry: List containing new or updated documents. Each object in the array can contain the following properties: _id, _rev, _deleted, and values for new and updated documents.
Optional. Indicates whether to assign new revision identifiers to new edits.

unordered-list.list-item: 201 Created – Document(s) have been created or updated
400 Bad Request – The request provided invalid JSON data

body.paragraph: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message body is a JSON documental that contains an array. Each array element contains the following objects:

row.entry: Indicates whether the operation was successful
